website_summaries.verdict: The New Balance 1201 resonated well with people who are in search of a reliable trainer for everyday walks on concrete and light trails. Despite its rugged style, it has been commended for its light disposition. Consumers also adored that the upper offered protection from wetness and cold. However, some reviewers said that it was short and narrow compared to other New Balance walking shoes. There were also complaints about its style and bulkiness. But in the end, despite some minor criticisms, it came highly recommended for people looking for a durable and comfortable walking footgear.
pros: A majority of wearers stated that the New Balance 1201 was very comfortable when used for walking on pavements and trails
The rugged style of the trainer pleased a high number of shoppers
Many owners commended the durability of this product
Numerous reviewers marked this product as being true to size and width
The upper material protected against the cold and the rain, according to plenty of users
A lot of buyers were delighted that the footgear was lightweight despite its bulky appearance
Multiple people appreciated the fact that this model accommodated custom inserts
The ankle support provided by the padded collar satisfied several purchasers
cons: A minority of consumers claimed that the foam insole in the New Balance 1201 was hard and caused foot pain
The build of the merchandise was too stiff, and a few users said that it needed breaking in to be more suitable for extended periods of walking
Some critics complained that the item looked clunky and ugly
The tread pattern on this trainer was not suitable for difficult trails because it was not very aggressive, according to a handful of individuals

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is made in China. It has very little padding on the sides by the heel and on the insole. I had to buy insoles to soften my steps. There are metal grommets on the top where the laces go through. The tongue is not wide enough to pad the metal grommet rivet on the inside of the shoe so it hurts the sides of my ankle. I have bought New Balance many times, but this is my first pair from China. They do not meet New Balance standards.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Bad sizing
customer_reviews.text: NB sizing is NOT dependable. I bought same shoe in 7xw and found it too narrow so I ordered same shoe in 7.5 XXW. They came today and the XXW was narrower then the first pair. DO THEY NOT HAVE SIZE CHARTS IN CHINA WERE THESE ARE MADE??? Sending them back!!!
customer_reviews.author: An avid mystery reader

customer_reviews.title: Not Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was not a good fit for my orthotics. In addition, I found the shoes very uncomfortable. The shoes are very stiff, no give at all. I like support, but these prevent the natural movement of the foot. Would not recommend to those with orthotics or problem feet.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wingnutt

customer_reviews.title: Hurt my heels.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. There is padding on the top of heel edge and none below the edge. So they rubbed horribly below rim padding. I will be returning tomorrow. I tried several adjustments none worked. They fit just after an hour or so, my heels blistered.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Needs additional insert for optimum support.
customer_reviews.text: I have problematic feet, but maintain a good 4+ Mile walk daily in my retirement. Wanted these shoes for walking. With the addition of an orthopedic insert these were somewhat supportive. With the insert provided, very little arch support available. The shoes are sturdy though and will work well with my own inserts.
customer_reviews.author: barb

customer_reviews.title: What does it take to get a pair of shoes?
customer_reviews.text: The first pair I returned was a 7.5. Although labeled as 7.5B the right shoe felt more like a 8.5 and maybe even a man's. So the 7B just came. So short that my toes are crushed up front. At this point I can't even tell what these feel like because I can't get the right size. I just re-ordered a 7.5 and they'd better not send me the same ones I returned. I just want a matched pair of sized shoes, not the launch codes for Pete's sake.
customer_reviews.author: Tsuba5

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's another winner for New Balance shoes. Looks and feels wonderful. Wore them shopping -- grocery and the mall and it was great. No achy feet or legs. These shoes are a must buy for everyone. I do own another pair similar, they are about 2 years old and I am still wearing them. They look great and feel great. Thanks New Balance
customer_reviews.author: barbara williams

customer_reviews.title: COMPFY WALKING SHOES
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are one of the most comfortable athletic shoes I've ever worn. They have a removable insole which is good for me because I have special arch supports which I need to wear. They fit me perfectly and are also good looking with two shades of grey and black soles. I intend to purchase another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Tig

customer_reviews.title: Shoe runs small.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking athletic shoe but it runs small. Also was uncomfortable as something was digging into the area of my ankle near the end of the tongue and where the collar and the tongue of the shoe meet. I couldn't figure out what it was so I sent the shoes back.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabee Chime

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and attractive New Balance shoes
customer_reviews.text: These comfortable, attractive shoes are a winner for my wide feet. They provide excellent support and the insole can be removed if you wish to use orthotics. They do run a half-size short compared with other New Balance models, so I returned the size 8 and exchanged them for the 8 1/2 and the fit was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Grammie K.

customer_reviews.title: Great size and shoe selection
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about New Balance shoes for me is the availability of wide widths. I can order just about any NB shoe in my size and know it will fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: C. Belloli

customer_reviews.title: New Balance is a favorite.
customer_reviews.text: Great as expected NEW BALANCE cozy fit. Plenty of support. Made with superior materials. Leather not plastic. Great price. I use for walking, running around and gardening. I tried to replace a ten year old tan suede pair similar to these and couldn’t find them. This was close enough in fit, comfort, support and quality. Thank you for staying consistent New Balance.
customer_reviews.author: VMBL

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I love New balance and they always fit right. But these are way too big in the heel and my foot sliding constantly. Even the body of the shoe is super stiff compared to any other shoe I've had with them. Quite disappointed considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bankergirl71

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter to do some summer construction projects. She loves them as they are sturdy and the bottom holds the foot while climbing around on deck joists and ladders. She says they are comfy and it lasts thru the day.
customer_reviews.author: Poeser

customer_reviews.title: Ok Walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I usually love New Balance Shoes but these rub my ankle bones. The balance of the shoe is of high quality but had to replace the insole for my high arch. Thought color was brown but is a sage green color.
customer_reviews.author: Golf117

customer_reviews.title: Sizing Flawed, Much too Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Amazon didn't deliver to my apt. and left in mgmt. office which was closed most of the time with COVID. Sizing is flawed, way off and fighting now to return as 4 days past window. Do NOT purchase, at least not from Amazon. Order wider than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Elaine Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Ok.
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable for me as the NB Women's 411 Walking Shoe series. But my size in that series was unavailable and I HAD to replace me old pair. I did replace the shoe laces with some from an older pair, as these came with oval laces that I couldn't get tight enough and wouldn't stay tied.
customer_reviews.author: Kansas Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too stiff
customer_reviews.text: Too stiff, bought them to help with plantar fasciitis. Not ones for that. Love yhe color.
customer_reviews.author: Frogeyes61

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves this shoe.
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a charge nurse so good shoes are important to her because she spends so much time on her feet.
customer_reviews.author: CJTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Fair Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes you pay a little and you get just that. These are a mid-range priced shoe and is very nice. Good support and very comfy. Im on my feet quite a bit and these are just the ticket.
customer_reviews.author: CK22

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Hiker
customer_reviews.text: I liked that they are sturdy for hiking on all terrain. I have short toes but wide width at toes. I always order 10 wide in New Balance, they are true to my foot and the fit is great!
customer_reviews.author: Norge

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for winter and spring.
customer_reviews.text: They are a little on the heavy side compared to the light weight mesh shoes out there. This is what I wanted for the winter and rainy season of spring.
customer_reviews.author: slymom7

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic support and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: One of the most comfortable pair of walking/hiking shoes. I’ve worn these for hikes/walks on fairly flat trails and they’ve worked great.
customer_reviews.author: kkferb

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and supportive!
customer_reviews.text: Fits like you expect a New Balance shoe to fit. The extra loop at the top of the shoe allows you to lace it up for more ankle support. With a little added water repellent spray it functions well in the snow. I'm extremely pleased with the shoe after walking in it for several days.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea 415

customer_reviews.title: Bulky
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to see they carried these in a 12 narrow, however they did not fit like a narrow shoe. They were wider than I expected and bulky. They looked like a men's shoe. Luckily the return process was easy.
customer_reviews.author: charles tavenner

customer_reviews.title: Never again !
customer_reviews.text: Bought my normal wide size, there very narrow and squeeze my feet I don't like em at all .its all about comfort and these missed the mark being the most uncomfortable shoes I own. Never will buy another pair ! Just awful.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Ok shoe
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable, they don’t feel quite as supportive as I hoped
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Side Tore Open
customer_reviews.text: After 8 months of use the leather side tore open. The rest of the shoe is still in really good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Leslee Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I bought an 8.5 X Wide but received a regular wide. It's tight and digs into my foot a little but I'll see if I can tolerate them. Overall, meh.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for inside and outside walking.
customer_reviews.text: Thick sole with good arch support. Easy to walk on gravel surface. I bought the black and brown pair. The black are wider fit. Brown fit as it should. Because they are mostly suede you can brush spots off to keep looking new. I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: john c

customer_reviews.title: Great except for the nylon laces
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of these shoes and the fit too, although they're a little on the short side. I'd give 4 stars if it weren't for the darn nylon laces, which won't stay tied. So frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday wear.
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear Sketchers and wanted to try a new brand. I was not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Promenchenkel

customer_reviews.title: FYI
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fit but the plastic grommet on one of the shoes has come off along with the metal insert from the inside. Still wearable.
customer_reviews.author: Becaweegee

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. Fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly. Finally a shoe wide enough at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Really like the shoes. They're a little stiff, but I'm having problems with my right foot so maybe it's me. You cannot beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Barbie M.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Ordered them in a wide width. Comfortable & easy 2 wear. I luv the color.
customer_reviews.author: B. Mac

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these shoes. They are comfortable and a good walking shoe. Am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mary b

customer_reviews.title: Like shoes
customer_reviews.text: Every day wear and the have made my feet feel better
customer_reviews.author: rhoda malley

customer_reviews.title: It’s nice to have a shoe with suede when living in a wet climate.
customer_reviews.text: Fits well except when I lace the right shoe all the way up it rubs against a bone in my foot which isn’t comfortable. It feels better when I don’t lace it all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Karen J. Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: The fit, color and that it came in 2E, which is very difficult to find.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta B.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the fit
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoe but to small. To be used for walking
customer_reviews.author: Tony Perry

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable from the minute I put my feet in them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs about a half size too small. Light hiking shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is the lightest of all hiking shoes tried. They run about a half size too small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The look was very nice but the size was not a wide shoe
customer_reviews.text: The look was very nice but the size was not a wide shoe. This shoe is very uncomfortable. No cushion at all. I feel like I'm walking on cement or rocks. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes for work. Great price and bought a second pair. I am on my feet all day at work and these hold up to the test.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I have a small foot, and the toes aren't like most others. My toes are short and rather all level so that I need a wide shoe rather than a long shoe. This shoe fits great and my orthotics fix great. I had another brand of shoe that are much more expensive and the orthotics just wouldn't work in them. Very happy with these shoes and I am sure to buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: shoes fit and feel perfect
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit fine and were exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

product_meta.title: New Balance Women's 1201v1 Walking Shoe
product_meta.description: The 1201 is for the consumer who is looking for a shoe that can go the distance in comfort, versatility, and performance. This durable and stable leather trail walker provides instant comfort in a casual silhouette that is perfect for all day wear.
